Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and superior quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. We believe in providing exceptional value to our customers, and we're confident that this product will exceed your expectations. For a limited time, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this product at an exclusive price of $150. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits firsthand. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
